mapper.insert: insert into in009t( receipt_id, quote_no, pg, pg_name, method, method_name, name, order_id, receipt_url, payment_data_card_name, payment_data_card_no, payment_data_card_quota, payment_data_card_auth_no, payment_data_vbank_bankname, payment_data_vbank_accountholder, payment_data_vbank_account, payment_data_vbank_expiredate, payment_data_vbank_username, payment_data_vbank_cash_result, price, status, payment_json ) values ( #{receipt_id}, #{quote_no}, #{pg}, #{pg_name}, #{method}, #{method_name}, #{name}, #{order_id}, #{receipt_url}, #{payment_data_card_name}, #{payment_data_card_no}, #{payment_data_card_quota}, #{payment_data_card_auth_no}, #{payment_data_vbank_bankname}, #{payment_data_vbank_accountholder}, #{payment_data_vbank_account}, #{payment_data_vbank_expiredate}, #{payment_data_vbank_username}, #{payment_data_vbank_cash_result}, #{price}, #{status}, #{payment_json} )
